title: Customer Service Virtual Assistant (Experienced) (Shopify + Fashion Dropshipping)
job_overview:
Now Hiring: Experienced Customer Service Virtual Assistant (Shopify + Fashion Dropshipping)
Full-Time | Remote | Long-Term Opportunity

Are you a seasoned Customer Support VA with a passion for fashion and e-commerce? We’re a fast-growing online fashion dropshipping brand searching for a dedicated, skilled, and reliable Virtual Assistant to handle customer service operations and help deliver an exceptional shopping experience.

This is a long-term, full-time remote role ideal for someone who thrives in a dynamic, fast-paced environment and has hands-on experience with Shopify and fashion dropshipping.

Who We're Looking For:
2+ years experience in e-commerce customer support

Proficient with Shopify (essential)

Confident using Google Sheets for tracking and data entry

Strong written English – clear, friendly, and professional tone

Self-starter with a quick learning curve and solid organizational skills

Reliable internet connection (screenshot required)

Backup internet and/or power is a strong plus

Ready for a long-term commitment and career growth

Your Work Style & Personality:
You’re proactive, dependable, and love solving problems

You take ownership and follow through on your responsibilities

You follow SOPs but also think independently when needed

You bring positive energy and value team collaboration

You want stability, growth, and to become part of something long-term

Key Responsibilities:
Respond promptly to customer inquiries via email and Shopify helpdesk tools

Process returns, refunds, and resolve order-related issues

Handle shipping inquiries and tracking updates

Maintain accurate internal records in Google Sheets

Liaise with suppliers for order and shipping concerns

Share weekly progress reports and highlight recurring issues

What We Offer:
A stable, long-term remote role in a supportive team

Weekly on-time payments

Respectful, high-performance remote work culture

Opportunities to grow into expanded roles

100% work-from-home flexibility

How to Apply:
To be considered, please send the following:

A short introduction about yourself

Your resume

A 1–2 minute video introducing yourself and your Shopify customer support experience

A screenshot of your internet speed test (use speedtest.net)

Confirmation of whether you have backup internet and/or power

Important: Only applicants with proven Shopify, Google Sheets, and e-commerce customer support experience will be considered. Please do not apply if you do not meet these requirements.
